title: Basalt Cliffs
insight: These hexagonal columns were created naturally when the Hallasan lava flowed into the sea.

title: Coastal Fields
insight: This was the end of the coastal walk loop. The ocean view was breathtaking at sunset.

title: WB Exhibit
insight: This piece was created by Werner Bronkhorst for the Korea exhibit. As soon as I saw the duck boats & bikers, I had a suspicion that it was the Han River.
